verses.text: \w In|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w first|strong="H2298"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* Baltasar \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w vision|strong="H2376"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* upon \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w bed|strong="H4903"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w writing|strong="H3790"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w he|strong="H0116"\w* comprehended \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* few \w words|strong="H4406"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* relating \w the|strong="H0116"\w* sum \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* short, \w he|strong="H0116"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w*:

I \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* \w in|strong="H1841"\w* my \w vision|strong="H2376"\w* \w by|strong="H2376"\w* \w night|strong="H3916"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w behold|strong="H0718"\w* \w the|strong="H2370"\w* \w four|strong="H0703"\w* \w winds|strong="H7308"\w* \w of|strong="H7308"\w* \w the|strong="H2370"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* strove upon \w the|strong="H2370"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w sea|strong="H3221"\w*.

And \w four|strong="H0703"\w* \w great|strong="H7260"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w*, \w different|strong="H8133"\w* \w one|strong="H1668"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w another|strong="H1668"\w*, came \w up|strong="H5559"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H8133"\w* \w sea|strong="H3221"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5922"\w* \w first|strong="H6933"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* like \w a|strong="H2370"\w* lioness, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w had|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w wings|strong="H1611"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w an|strong="H2370"\w* \w eagle|strong="H5403"\w*: \w I|strong="H4481"\w* beheld till her \w wings|strong="H1611"\w* \w were|strong="H1934"\w* \w plucked|strong="H4804"\w* off, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* she \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5191"\w* up \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w stood|strong="H6966"\w* upon her \w feet|strong="H7271"\w* \w as|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* \w man|strong="H0606"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w heart|strong="H3825"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* \w man|strong="H0606"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* her.

\w And|strong="H3652"\w* \w behold|strong="H0718"\w* \w another|strong="H0317"\w* \w beast|strong="H2423"\w* \w like|strong="H1821"\w* \w a|strong="H1821"\w* \w bear|strong="H1678"\w* \w stood|strong="H6966"\w* up on \w one|strong="H2298"\w* \w side|strong="H7859"\w*: \w and|strong="H3652"\w* there \w were|strong="H2423"\w* \w three|strong="H8532"\w* rows \w in|strong="H6966"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6433"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H3652"\w* \w in|strong="H6966"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8128"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H3652"\w* \w thus|strong="H3652"\w* \w they|strong="H3652"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w it|strong="H1321"\w*: \w Arise|strong="H6966"\w*, \w devour|strong="H0399"\w* \w much|strong="H7690"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1321"\w*.

\w After|strong="H0870"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* beheld, \w and|strong="H2370"\w* lo, \w another|strong="H0317"\w* \w like|strong="H7217"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* \w leopard|strong="H5245"\w*, \w and|strong="H2370"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w had|strong="H1768"\w* upon \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w four|strong="H0703"\w* \w wings|strong="H1611"\w* \w as|strong="H1768"\w* \w of|strong="H5922"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* fowl, \w and|strong="H2370"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w beast|strong="H2423"\w* \w had|strong="H1768"\w* \w four|strong="H0703"\w* \w heads|strong="H7217"\w*, \w and|strong="H2370"\w* power \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w*.

\w After|strong="H0870"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* beheld \w in|strong="H8133"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w vision|strong="H2376"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w night|strong="H3916"\w*, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* lo, \w a|strong="H2370"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7244"\w* \w beast|strong="H2423"\w*, \w terrible|strong="H0574"\w* \w and|strong="H6523"\w* wonderful, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* exceeding \w strong|strong="H8624"\w*, it \w had|strong="H1768"\w* \w great|strong="H7260"\w* \w iron|strong="H6523"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8128"\w*, \w eating|strong="H0399"\w* \w and|strong="H6523"\w* breaking \w in|strong="H8133"\w* pieces, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* treading \w down|strong="H7512"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* with \w its|strong="H4481"\w* \w feet|strong="H7271"\w*: \w and|strong="H6523"\w* it \w was|strong="H1934"\w* unlike \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* other \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w had|strong="H1768"\w* \w seen|strong="H2370"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* it, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w had|strong="H1768"\w* \w ten|strong="H6236"\w* \w horns|strong="H7162"\w*.

\w I|strong="H4481"\w* considered \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w horns|strong="H7162"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w behold|strong="H0431"\w* \w another|strong="H0317"\w* \w little|strong="H2192"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w* sprung out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* midst \w of|strong="H4481"\w* them: \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w first|strong="H6933"\w* \w horns|strong="H7162"\w* \w were|strong="H1934"\w* plucked \w up|strong="H6925"\w* at \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w presence|strong="H6925"\w* thereof: \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w behold|strong="H0431"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5870"\w* like \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5870"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w a|strong="H1934"\w* \w man|strong="H0606"\w* \w were|strong="H1934"\w* in \w this|strong="H1668"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w a|strong="H1934"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6433"\w* \w speaking|strong="H4449"\w* \w great|strong="H7260"\w* things.

\w I|strong="H1768"\w* beheld till \w thrones|strong="H3764"\w* \w were|strong="H1934"\w* placed, \w and|strong="H2370"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w Ancient|strong="H6268"\w* \w of|strong="H6268"\w* \w days|strong="H3118"\w* \w sat|strong="H3488"\w*: \w his|strong="H1768"\w* garment \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w white|strong="H2358"\w* \w as|strong="H1768"\w* \w snow|strong="H8517"\w*, \w and|strong="H2370"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w hair|strong="H8177"\w* \w of|strong="H6268"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w like|strong="H7217"\w* clean \w wool|strong="H6015"\w*: \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w throne|strong="H3764"\w* \w like|strong="H7217"\w* \w flames|strong="H7631"\w* \w of|strong="H6268"\w* \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*: \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w wheels|strong="H1535"\w* \w of|strong="H6268"\w* it \w like|strong="H7217"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* \w burning|strong="H1815"\w* \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*.

\w A|strong="H6966"\w* swift stream \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w fire|strong="H5135"\w* issued \w forth|strong="H5312"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w*: \w thousands|strong="H0506"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w thousands|strong="H0506"\w* ministered \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w*, \w and|strong="H5609"\w* ten \w thousand|strong="H0506"\w* times \w a|strong="H6966"\w* hundred \w thousand|strong="H0506"\w* \w stood|strong="H6966"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w*: \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w judgment|strong="H1780"\w* \w sat|strong="H3488"\w*, \w and|strong="H5609"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w books|strong="H5609"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w opened|strong="H6606"\w*.

\w I|strong="H4481"\w* beheld \w because|strong="H4481"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w voice|strong="H7032"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w great|strong="H7260"\w* \w words|strong="H4406"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w* \w spoke|strong="H4449"\w*: \w and|strong="H2370"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w beast|strong="H2423"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w slain|strong="H6992"\w*, \w and|strong="H2370"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w body|strong="H1655"\w* thereof \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H0007"\w*, \w and|strong="H2370"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* \w to|strong="H5705"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w fire|strong="H0785"\w* \w to|strong="H5705"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* burnt:

\w And|strong="H5705"\w* that \w the|strong="H3052"\w* power \w of|strong="H7606"\w* \w the|strong="H3052"\w* other \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* \w was|strong="H7985"\w* \w taken|strong="H5709"\w* \w away|strong="H5709"\w*: \w and|strong="H5705"\w* that \w times|strong="H2166"\w* \w of|strong="H7606"\w* \w life|strong="H2417"\w* \w were|strong="H2423"\w* \w appointed|strong="H2166"\w* them \w for|strong="H5705"\w* \w a|strong="H2166"\w* \w time|strong="H5732"\w*, \w and|strong="H5705"\w* \w time|strong="H5732"\w*.

I beheld therefore in \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w vision|strong="H2376"\w* \w of|strong="H1247"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w night|strong="H3916"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* lo, one like \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H1247"\w* \w man|strong="H0606"\w* \w came|strong="H0858"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w clouds|strong="H6050"\w* \w of|strong="H1247"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* he \w came|strong="H0858"\w* even \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w Ancient|strong="H6268"\w* \w of|strong="H1247"\w* \w days|strong="H3118"\w*: \w and|strong="H0606"\w* they \w presented|strong="H7127"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0524"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w gave|strong="H3052"\w* \w him|strong="H3052"\w* power, \w and|strong="H0524"\w* \w glory|strong="H3367"\w*, \w and|strong="H0524"\w* a \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*: \w and|strong="H0524"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5972"\w*, tribes \w and|strong="H0524"\w* tongues shall \w serve|strong="H6399"\w* \w him|strong="H3052"\w*: \w his|strong="H3606"\w* power \w is|strong="H1768"\w* an \w everlasting|strong="H5957"\w* power \w that|strong="H1768"\w* shall \w not|strong="H3809"\w* be \w taken|strong="H5709"\w* \w away|strong="H5709"\w*: \w and|strong="H0524"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* shall \w not|strong="H3809"\w* be \w destroyed|strong="H2255"\w*.

My \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* trembled, \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* affrighted at these things, \w and|strong="H1841"\w* the \w visions|strong="H2376"\w* \w of|strong="H7217"\w* my \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w troubled|strong="H0927"\w* me.

\w I|strong="H4481"\w* went \w near|strong="H7127"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w one|strong="H2298"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w them|strong="H0560"\w* \w that|strong="H3046"\w* \w stood|strong="H6966"\w* \w by|strong="H4481"\w*, \w and|strong="H7127"\w* \w asked|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* truth \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w* \w things|strong="H3606"\w*, \w and|strong="H7127"\w* he \w told|strong="H0560"\w* me \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w words|strong="H4406"\w*, \w and|strong="H7127"\w* instructed me:

\w These|strong="H0459"\w* \w four|strong="H0703"\w* \w great|strong="H7260"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w four|strong="H0703"\w* kingdoms, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* shall \w arise|strong="H6966"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*.

But \w the|strong="H6902"\w* \w saints|strong="H6922"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H6902"\w* most high God shall take \w the|strong="H6902"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*: \w and|strong="H4437"\w* they shall \w possess|strong="H2631"\w* \w the|strong="H6902"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w for|strong="H5705"\w* \w ever|strong="H5957"\w* \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*.

\w After|strong="H4481"\w* \w this|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w would|strong="H3605"\w* diligently learn \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7244"\w* \w beast|strong="H2423"\w*. \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* very \w different|strong="H8133"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* exceeding terrible: \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8128"\w* \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w claws|strong="H2953"\w* \w were|strong="H1934"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w iron|strong="H6523"\w*: \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w devoured|strong="H0399"\w* \w and|strong="H3605"\w* broke \w in|strong="H3605"\w* pieces, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* stamped upon \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w feet|strong="H7271"\w*:

\w And|strong="H5308"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w ten|strong="H6236"\w* \w horns|strong="H7162"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H1768"\w* \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w head|strong="H7217"\w*: \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* other \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w came|strong="H5308"\w* \w up|strong="H6925"\w*, \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w horns|strong="H7162"\w* \w fell|strong="H5308"\w*: \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H1768"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5870"\w*, \w and|strong="H5308"\w* a \w mouth|strong="H6433"\w* \w speaking|strong="H4449"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* things, \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w was|strong="H7162"\w* greater \w than|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* rest.

I beheld, \w and|strong="H2370"\w* lo, \w that|strong="H2370"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w* \w war|strong="H7129"\w* \w against|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H2370"\w* \w saints|strong="H6922"\w*, \w and|strong="H2370"\w* prevailed over \w them|strong="H3202"\w*,

Till \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w Ancient|strong="H6268"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w days|strong="H3118"\w* \w came|strong="H0858"\w* \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w gave|strong="H3052"\w* \w judgment|strong="H1780"\w* \w to|strong="H5705"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w saints|strong="H6922"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* most High, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w time|strong="H2166"\w* \w came|strong="H0858"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w saints|strong="H6922"\w* obtained \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1855"\w* \w thus|strong="H3652"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w*: \w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7244"\w* \w beast|strong="H2423"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7244"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* upon \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1934"\w* greater \w than|strong="H4481"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4437"\w*, \w and|strong="H1855"\w* shall \w devour|strong="H0399"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w whole|strong="H3606"\w* \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, \w and|strong="H1855"\w* shall \w tread|strong="H1759"\w* \w it|strong="H1759"\w* \w down|strong="H1759"\w*, \w and|strong="H1855"\w* break \w it|strong="H1759"\w* \w in|strong="H4437"\w* pieces.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H6966"\w* \w ten|strong="H6236"\w* \w horns|strong="H7162"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H6966"\w* same \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, shall be \w ten|strong="H6236"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w another|strong="H0321"\w* shall rise up \w after|strong="H0311"\w* them, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H1932"\w* shall be mightier \w than|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H6966"\w* former, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H1932"\w* shall bring down \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*.
